name: Mortar Clash 3D: Battle Games
description:
“Mortar Clash 3D: Battle Games” is a battle game that you should act strategically.

In this strategy game, players battle and combat each other by positioning their mortars and organizing an attack against the opposing one.

Defend and save your territory.

Select the power and angle on the mortar shells as you fire upon the enemy’s mortar.

Find targets and shoot. Strike before the enemy!

Defend your base using your only weapon mortar!
